title: League lags only when in a party
body:
So whenever i try to play league with friends the game starts to lag insanely. It has more lag depending on how many people are in the party (i.e. 200 ping for 1 person or 999+ for 5 people)
The game works fine whenever i solo queue so it only lags while in a party
Does anyone know whats happening?

replies.body: It sounds like your network can't maintain a strong connection and causing you to have some input delays.  Being in a group may be a coincidence, but we have some resources to rule out some possibilities.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your connection and get this fixed up.  Hopefully, this will get you squared away but let me know!
I seem to have lag whenever I play with my boyfriend, not sure what the problem is .-.
